caption.p: UPGMA dendrogram constructed using data obtained AFLP polymorphic markers (1000 permutations). Individuals featured: Black circle: L. grata (LT9, LT16, LT44, LT47, LU142, LU143, LU144); white circle: L. salvifolia (LT118); black small circle: L. sidoides (LT116; LT117); lozenge: L. velutina (LT42, LT46, LT78, LT89, LU145, LU146, LU148)
